textAfterTable: UB Is focused on the individual Login to rate or flag the reviews Shelby from Baltimore, MD 01/05/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 7 out of 8 people found this review useful. 2 of 41 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students UB is a great school to come to! It will give you a great atmosphere and you will be pleased. Bang for the buck UB is one of the most inexpensive schools I've seen. and with the tuition being so affordable, they offer alot. They also help you find ways to maintain money, and find money for college. Am enjoying being here Being at UB, all our sports are intramural. Even with that, UB find other ways to keep you involved with things on campus. We've had block parties, pep rallies, and they make you feel right at home. Am learning a lot
